page.title: 05HARBURY VILLAGE TRAIL
page.content: Start at Village Hall and park car. Follow South Parade to Vicarage Lane and Butt Lane. At junction with Hall Lane look at Walnut Tree Cottage, a stone house, modernised in recent years. Once known as Tunnel Cottage. Follow Hall Lane to Crown Street and visit the Crown public house, the oldest pub in Harbury. A good meal can be had here. Follow Crown Street into Church Street and visit the historical church and belfry. A few metres from church you will see The Dog, once destroyed by fire. Make your way down Mill Street, Heber Drive,Manor Orchard and call at The Old New Inn. Follow Park Lane, pass the historic Manor House and daffodil garden, along South Parade back to the Village Hall.
